job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) in Ossining, NY
pros: Great co-workers; we watch each other's back; Overtime is available; Work 5 days a week, work one late night, work one Saturday a month; Hours are 8:30am to 5pm.
cons: Too many NEW patients requesting URGENT appointments, and NO availability for EXISTING patients for ROUTINE visits. Puts a lot of strain, frustration, and pressure for nurses to triage, and schedule "same-day" appointments because we "do not turn anyone away".
Men superiors put the women employees in uncomfortable situations.
